ocsvm.title: OCSVM (One-Class Support Vector Machine)
ocsvm.desc: OCSVM builds a boundary that encloses most normal data and marks as anomalies the points outside it. Useful for unusual IoT behaviors.

iforest.title: IForest (Isolation Forest)
iforest.desc: Isolation Forest isolates points using random trees; efficient for large volumes and useful for network anomaly detection.

kmeans.title: K-Means
kmeans.desc: Clusters data into internally similar groups. Useful for grouping patterns and spotting outliers.

autoencoder.title: Multiclass Autoencoder
autoencoder.desc: Combines autoencoder and supervised head for joint reconstruction and prediction.
